articles.title: Small, well-built Chinese EV called the Seagull poses a big threat to the US auto industry - The Associated Press

articles.title: Sen. Lindsey Graham Suggests Nuking Gaza, Calls Hiroshima 'the Right Decision' - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Graham argued Israel would be justified in obliterating Gaza because America did it to Japan 80 years ago.
articles.content: Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) offered a baffling comparison of Israels war on Gaza to the U.S. decision to drop atomic bombs on Japan during World War II, telling Israel to do whatever you have to do to… [+2353 chars]
